Title: Content Editor
Description: Content Editor is v1.5 of RichTextEditor. Content Editor is an advanced notepad.Its UI and advanced controls are brought for QIOS for free licensed under Ms-Pl.
HomeWiki:
Content Editor is a program built in Visual Studio and packaged under Advanced Installer. It's an advanced notepad with an Office 2007 UI and ribbon control from QIOS. It requires .Net Framework 3.5 and has decended from another program.

It has been stablely released here. I hope you like it. It took me 10-15 days to develop it.

I hereby thank Codeplex for empowering my project.
